title: Cat Water Fountain for Drinking: Stainless Steel Cat Fountain - 2.2L Cat Water Bowl - Pet Water Fountain - Pet Water Dispenser - Cat Drinking Fountain UK - with 6 Filters + 3 Foam Filters
features: 【Precise control of water level】By listening to the suggestions of pet families, we understand the necessity of cat water fountain with water level windows, so the designers of GIOTOHUN have developed this cat water bowl, which can be easily observed and controlled by the owner, saving time and energy, and also preventing the water pump from being damaged due to running out of water

【Meet the needs of pets】The 2.2L capacity cat water fountain stainless steel not only meets the needs of cats for 5-7 days of drinking water, but also meets the needs of more use scenarios.Because of its small size, it doesn't take up space no matter where it is placed. The fully automatic drinking fountains for cats can be assembled and disassembled effortlessly, making routine maintenance and cleaning a breeze

【Combination of Stainless Steel and Faucet】Our stainless steel water fountain cat is made of 304 grade stainless steel, which contrasts sharply with the fragility of plastic and symbolizes the toughness of the product. Stainless steel can also withstand high-intensity cleaning, keeping cat bowls clean at all times. The faucet's spout is designed to attract cats, and this pet fountain is like a kitten water park

【Enjoy every sip of fresh water】Pet water dispenser has an advanced filtration system, a filter made of cotton layer, ion exchange resin and activated carbon, which integrates adsorption, filtration, purification and other functions, plus the high-density sponge of the water pump to remove fine particles, to ensure that every sip of water the cat drinks is fresh and clean. (Please search for "GIOTOHUN filter" to purchase the correct filter)

【Falling Leaf-like Silence】The decibel level of cat fountain stainless steel is less than 30dB when it is running, and there is a soft falling sound in the center when it comes out of the water, and it will not cause trouble to you and your pet's life, just like the sound of a leaf falling slowly. The cat drinking fountain uk water pump has a bright blue LED light, and the light is refracted through the window, so that even at night, pets can find a water dispenser to drink

【The pursuit of a better life】Our products are not only a tool for cats to drink water, but also a pursuit of a better life. While guarding the cat's health, it also protects the owner's quiet life. If water fountain doesn't work, don't hesitate to contact us to help you out
